articles.title: De Winter jokes: "Did they give me the assist for Pavlovic's goal?"
articles.summary:
Koni De Winter spoke to DAZN after the victory in Cremona. His words:

Did you make fun of Pavlovic for the nose goal?

“I didn't see it, I'm happy he scored.
